desc.en: Shiroko rescues Sensei and eventually the two arrive at Abydos' Foreclosure Task Force club room. Soon after, the school is attacked by the Kata-Kata Helmet Gang, and Sensei teams up with the students to fight back.

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.thai: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.jp: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.thai: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.ko: After defeating the Helmet Gang, the Foreclosure Task Force introduce themselves to Sensei at Abydos High School. Having solved some supply issues with Sensei's help, the students want to use their momentum to crush the Helmet Gang's outpost.
desc.zh_tw: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的對策委員會学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 击败头盔团重返阿拜多斯高中的对策委员会学生们，再次向老师自我介绍。在老师的帮助下，学校的补给问题已顺利解决，这让学生们非常开心。大伙们想趁势破坏片方头盔团的前哨基地。

desc.ko: Right after defeating the Helmet Gang, everyone is amazed by Sensei's ability on commanding the battle. Then everyone introduces themselves.
desc.zh_tw: 在击退头盔圈后，众人对老师刚刚的指挥感到赞叹不已；之后众人分别介绍了自己与對策委員會。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在击退头盔圈后，众人对老师刚刚的指挥感到赞叹不已；之后众人分别介绍了自己与对策委员会。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在击退头盔圈后，众人对老师刚刚的指挥感到赞叹不已；之后众人分别介绍了自己与对策委员会。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.jp: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.thai: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.ko: Sensei and the Foreclosure Task Force trail Serika to her part-time job at a ramen shop. They end up sharing a nice meal with her, but Serika is still quite sullen. On her way back from work, Serika is kidnapped by the Helmet Gang.
desc.zh_tw: 老师和對策委員會学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪芹香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是芹香依然一副没好气的样子。芹香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪茜香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是茜香依然一副没好气的样子。茜香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师和对策委员会学生们跟踪芹香，来到她打工的拉面店。大家吃了拉面度过愉快的时光，可是芹香依然一副没好气的样子。芹香在打完工回家的路上被头盔团绑架。

desc.en: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.jp: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.thai: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.ko: Sensei bumps into Serika and greets her nicely, wanting to know where and what she's going. Serika dodges but was follows by Sensei closely; she later admits that she is going to part-time jobs and askes Sensei not to follow, yet Sensei doesn't listen.
desc.zh_tw: 老师撞见了茜香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。茜香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；茜香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师撞见了芹香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。芹香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；芹香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 老师撞见了茜香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。茜香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；茜香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师撞见了芹香，向她亲切地问好，并表示想知道她去哪里、做什么。芹香躲闪着，但老师步步紧跟；芹香后承认是打工，并要求老师不再跟随，但老师并没有听从。

desc.en: Sensei brings the rest of the Foreclosure Task Force to the very ramen store that Serika is working for. Though surprised, Serika leads the way to the table; later, Nonomi purposes to pay with her cards, but Sensei does that with his own at last. After lunch, everyone returns to school under the strong request by the embarrassed Serika.

desc.zh_tw: 老师带着對策委員會的其它人来到了茜香打工的拉面店，茜香大为震撼。然后，茜香带领大家就坐；之后，野乃美主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在茜香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了芹香打工的拉面店，芹香大为震撼。然后，芹香带领大家就坐；之后，野宫主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在芹香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 老师带着对策委员会的其它人来到了芹香打工的拉面店，芹香大为震撼。然后，芹香带领大家就坐；之后，野宫主动提出结账，但老师最终还是用大人的卡片结了账。吃饱后，大家在芹香的难堪与强烈要求下返回了学校。

desc.ko: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.

desc.zh_tw: The fourth track in Blue Archive OST, with rhythm cheerful and bright. It is often used in many stories.

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.thai: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。
desc.zh_tw: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.en: When Serika goes incommunicado after parting at the ramen shop, Sensei uses Schale's authority to triangulate the position of Serika's cell phone and sets out to rescue her.
desc.jp: When Serika goes incommunicado after parting at the ramen shop, Sensei uses Schale's authority to triangulate the position of Serika's cell phone and sets out to rescue her.
desc.thai: When Serika goes incommunicado after parting at the ramen shop, Sensei uses Schale's authority to triangulate the position of Serika's cell phone and sets out to rescue her.
desc.ko: When Serika goes incommunicado after parting at the ramen shop, Sensei uses Schale's authority to triangulate the position of Serika's cell phone and sets out to rescue her.
desc.zh_tw: 在拉面店散会后，老师一发现联系不上茜香，就以夏萊的权限查出茜香的手机发信位置奔赴营救。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在拉面店散会后，老师一发现联系不上芹香，就以夏莱的权限查出芹香的手机发信位置奔赴营救。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在拉面店散会后，老师一发现联系不上茜香，就以夏莱的权限查出茜香的手机发信位置奔赴营救。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在拉面店散会后，老师一发现联系不上芹香，就以沙勒的权限查出芹香的手机发信位置奔赴营救。

desc.en: Already far into the off-work time, yet no trace of Serika can be found. Shiroko thinks it is the Helmet Gang who kidnaps her, and the returned Sensei and Hoshino proves that guess.
desc.jp: Already far into the off-work time, yet no trace of Serika can be found. Shiroko thinks it is the Helmet Gang who kidnaps her, and the returned Sensei and Hoshino proves that guess.
desc.thai: Already far into the off-work time, yet no trace of Serika can be found. Shiroko thinks it is the Helmet Gang who kidnaps her, and the returned Sensei and Hoshino proves that guess.
desc.ko: Already far into the off-work time, yet no trace of Serika can be found. Shiroko thinks it is the Helmet Gang who kidnaps her, and the returned Sensei and Hoshino proves that guess.
desc.zh_tw: 早过了打工的下班时间，却哪都找不到茜香的踪迹。白子立刻认为可能是头盔团绑架了茜香，而之后回来的星野与老师证明了这一猜测。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 早过了打工的下班时间，却哪都找不到芹香的踪迹。白子立刻认为可能是头盔团绑架了芹香，而之后回来的星野与老师证明了这一猜测。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 早过了打工的下班时间，却哪都找不到芹香的踪迹。白子立刻认为可能是头盔团绑架了芹香，而之后回来的星野与老师证明了这一猜测。

desc.en: Serika, who finds herself being kidnapped, feels extremely uneasy, fearing that it will make everyone abandon or mistake her.
desc.jp: Serika, who finds herself being kidnapped, feels extremely uneasy, fearing that it will make everyone abandon or mistake her.
desc.thai: Serika, who finds herself being kidnapped, feels extremely uneasy, fearing that it will make everyone abandon or mistake her.
desc.ko: Serika, who finds herself being kidnapped, feels extremely uneasy, fearing that it will make everyone abandon or mistake her.
desc.zh_tw: 发现了自己被绑走的茜香深感不安，怕这样就此被众人抛弃或误会。就在她在货车后面悄悄啜泣时，對策委員會五人及时赶到，将卡车炸毁救出了茜香。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 发现了自己被绑走的芹香深感不安，怕这样就此被众人抛弃或误会。就在她在货车后面悄悄啜泣时，对策委员会五人及时赶到，将卡车炸毁救出了芹香。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 发现了自己被绑走的芹香深感不安，怕这样就此被众人抛弃或误会。

desc.en: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.jp: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.thai: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.ko: Aru grapples with her feelings after realizing that the ones who treated her to a bowl of ramen were actually Abydos students. She resolves anew to attack Abydos High School with her hired guns.
desc.zh_tw: 亞瑠后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。亞瑠被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿露后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。阿露被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 亚瑠后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。亚瑠被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱露后来才知道招待自己吃拉面的对象是阿拜多斯高中的学生。爱露被罪恶感煎熬好一阵子，但还是马上狠下心，动员人手前去攻击阿拜多斯高中。

desc.en: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.jp: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.thai: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.ko: Thanks to the work of the Foreclosure Task Force, Aru and Problem Solver are forced to withdraw.
desc.zh_tw: 多亏對策委員會学生们大展身手，才使得亞瑠和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得阿露和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得亚瑠和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 多亏对策委员会学生们大展身手，才使得爱露和便利屋职员们战败后逃之夭夭。

desc.en: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.
desc.jp: It is not until the departure with the Abydos does Aru realize their identity with the help from other members. Though conflicted in heart, Aru is determined to launch the attack at last.

desc.zh_tw: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒亞瑠他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，亞瑠最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒阿露他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，阿露最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒亚瑠他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，亚瑠最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 直到与阿拜多斯一行人告别之后，剩下的成员们才提醒爱露他们的身份。虽然内心纠结，爱露最后还是下定决心发起了进攻。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.thai: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.

desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部一行人勉强赶上截止期限，完成了<传说年代记2>的开发。上传游戏后，遊戲開發部社团活动室遭到来历不明的枪击。

desc.en: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.jp: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.thai: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.ko: The shooter was Neru, the president of the Maid Club. Claiming that her last battle with Aris had piqued her interest, Neru challenges Aris to a fight. One destructive battle later, and Neru, satisfied, goes on her way.
desc.zh_tw: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长寧瑠。寧瑠说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对愛麗絲提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长尼禄。尼禄说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长宁瑠。宁瑠说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 对社团活动室发动枪击的，是女仆部的部长妮露。妮露说对上次的战斗大感兴趣，并对爱丽丝提出挑战。经过好一阵混战才满足地回去。

desc.en: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flooding in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by a few bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.jp: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flooding in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by a few bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.

desc.ko: The GDD finally finished it at the very last moment. Momoi uploaded the demo for everyone to download. The comments started flooding in, as the download counter counting fast. When everyone was worried and nervous, the club room was hit by a few bullet shots. Everyone began to engage.
desc.zh_tw: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 开发部众人终于在最后一刻完成了作品，桃井提出要将demo上传到网上供大家下载。评论开始涌来，下载量也在激增，而就在众人紧张不安时，社团突然被几发炮弹击中。众人开始迎战。

desc.en: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a fight. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer get pursued. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light.
desc.jp: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a fight. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer get pursued. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light.
desc.thai: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a fight. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer get pursued. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light.
desc.ko: Neru came and challenged the GDD. Neru praised for Yuzu's courage at first, then challenged Aris into a fight. She claimed that if Aris could defeat her, then everything from the past would no longer get pursued. Before she could react, Aris fired the Sword of Light.
desc.zh_tw: 寧瑠前来挑战开发部众人。寧瑠先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向愛麗絲发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。寧瑠还没反应过来，愛麗絲就抢先发射了光之剑。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 尼禄前来挑战开发部众人。尼禄先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向爱丽丝发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。尼禄还没反应过来，爱丽丝就抢先发射了光之剑。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 妮露前来挑战开发部众人。妮露先是称赞了柚子的勇气，然后向爱丽丝发出挑战，提出只要能打败她，以前的事情就一笔勾销。妮露还没反应过来，爱丽丝就抢先发射了光之剑。

desc.en: Though Neru has a significant advantage in melee combat, but Aris, by pointing the railgun towards the floor and firing it, retreated at the cost of injuring herself 48%. Neru decided not to pursue afterwards.

desc.zh_tw: 虽然寧瑠在近战方面优势显著，但愛麗絲通过将光之剑朝向地面开炮，在自伤48%的情况下先行撤离。寧瑠最后决定不再追究。

desc.en: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. Thanks to this, the club is saved from getting shut down. In the midst of everyone's celebrations, the gaming device installed with the G.BIBLE starts to operate on its own.
desc.jp: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. Thanks to this, the club is saved from getting shut down. In the midst of everyone's celebrations, the gaming device installed with the G.BIBLE starts to operate on its own.

desc.ko: The Millennium Prize, which gives recognition to the Millennium School's best inventions, awards the Game Development Department a special prize for the development of Tales Saga Chronicle 2. Thanks to this, the club is saved from getting shut down. In the midst of everyone's celebrations, the gaming device installed with the G.BIBLE starts to operate on its own.
desc.zh_tw: 遊戲開發部开发的<传说年代记2>，在选拔千年学园优秀发明的<千年大赏>中获得特别奖，因而免于遊戲開發部的废社危机。在所有人都很开心的时候，安装了<G.Bible>的游戏机自己动了起来。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 游戏开发部开发的<传说年代记2>，在选拔千禧年学园优秀发明的<千禧年大赏>中获得特别奖，因而免于游戏开发部的废社危机。在所有人都很开心的时候，安装了<G.Bible>的游戏机自己动了起来。

desc.zh_cn_cn: 游戏开发部开发的<传说年代记2>，在选拔千年学园优秀发明的<千年大赏>中获得特别奖，因而免于游戏开发部的废社危机。在所有人都很开心的时候，安装了<G.Bible>的游戏机自己动了起来。

desc.en: Aris had a psychological fear on the maid. The damage caused by the combat was carefully handled by the C&C. After everything had all settled, everyone began to watch the live stream of the competition.
desc.jp: Aris had a psychological fear on the maid. The damage caused by the combat was carefully handled by the C&C. After everything had all settled, everyone began to watch the live stream of the competition.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲对女仆装有了心理阴影，与寧瑠战斗导致的损坏也被他们妥善处理了。尘埃落定后，众人开始观看比赛的现场直播。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝对女仆装有了心理阴影，与尼禄战斗导致的损坏也被他们妥善处理了。尘埃落定后，众人开始观看比赛的现场直播。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝对女仆装有了心理阴影，与宁瑠战斗导致的损坏也被他们妥善处理了。尘埃落定后，众人开始观看比赛的现场直播。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝对女仆装有了心理阴影，与妮露战斗导致的损坏也被他们妥善处理了。尘埃落定后，众人开始观看比赛的现场直播。

desc.en: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.
desc.jp: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.zh_tw: The 64th track from Blue Archive, a widely recognized song for its appearance with the Game Development Department story. It has become the de facto identity and theme song for the GDD and its members.

desc.en: The result was announced by Kotori from the Engineering Department. Seven were awarded, but none from the GDD. In despair, Momoi broke the TV with her guns. Everyone was sentimental. Although Yuzu said that she could return to her dorm with courage, Aris became the most worrying one for everyone.
desc.jp: The result was announced by Kotori from the Engineering Department. Seven were awarded, but none from the GDD. In despair, Momoi broke the TV with her guns. Everyone was sentimental. Although Yuzu said that she could return to her dorm with courage, Aris became the most worrying one for everyone.

Although Yuzu said that she could return to her dorm with courage, Aris became the most worrying one for everyone.
desc.zh_tw: 比赛结果由工程師部的亞都梨发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报完都不见开发部的TSC2，桃井绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但愛麗絲的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 比赛结果由工程部的柯托莉发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报完都不见开发部的TSC2，桃井绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但爱丽丝的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 比赛结果由工程师部的亚都梨发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报完都不见开发部的TSC2，桃井绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但爱丽丝的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 比赛结果由工程部的琴里发布，总共有七个获奖项目。然而七个播报完都不见开发部的TSC2，桃绝望之下用枪扫射了屏幕。大家都很感伤，柚子虽然表示自己有勇气回到宿舍，但爱丽丝的去向却成为了众人最担心的一点。

desc.en: Yuuka visits the GDD, congratulating they won a reward. As the TV was broken, everyone watched the live stream on their phones. On the livestream, the reviewer spoke highly of the elements for a retro RPG that TSC2 possesses, and therefore a special award was given.
desc.jp: Yuuka visits the GDD, congratulating they won a reward. As the TV was broken, everyone watched the live stream on their phones. On the livestream, the reviewer spoke highly of the elements for a retro RPG that TSC2 possesses, and therefore a special award was given.

desc.zh_tw: 優香拜访遊戲開發部，庆祝所有人取得奖项。因为电视机被打穿，众人在手机上观看了直播。直播中，颁奖员高度赞扬了TSC2作为复古RPG的要素，并由此授予了他们特别奖。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 优香拜访游戏开发部，庆祝所有人取得奖项。因为电视机被打穿，众人在手机上观看了直播。直播中，颁奖员高度赞扬了TSC2作为复古RPG的要素，并由此授予了他们特别奖。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.jp: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.

desc.ko: The GDD got rid of the crisis of being closed. Yuuka and Maki expressed their appreciation. The two most upvote comments were nothing but the praise for TSC2. Yuuka announced the decision to postpone the closure and apologized to Momoi. Aris become the member of the GDD formally.
desc.zh_tw: 开发部最终免于废社，就连優香和真紀都给出了好评，最热门的两条评论也满是对TSC2的称赞。優香宣布了暂缓废社的决定，并向桃井抱歉。愛麗絲正式成为开发部成员。

desc.en: While wandering around campus, Aris runs into Sumire, who is out on a jog. The two of them bond over being both comrades in arms as well as sports. As Aris continues her adventure, she runs into Asuna and Karin in their school uniforms off campus, and she invites them to join her party. That moment, Aris learns that Neru is looking for her and quickly takes off to another location.
desc.jp: While wandering around campus, Aris runs into Sumire, who is out on a jog. The two of them bond over being both comrades in arms as well as sports. As Aris continues her adventure, she runs into Asuna and Karin in their school uniforms off campus, and she invites them to join her party. That moment, Aris learns that Neru is looking for her and quickly takes off to another location.

That moment, Aris learns that Neru is looking for her and quickly takes off to another location.

As Aris continues her adventure, she runs into Asuna and Karin in their school uniforms off campus, and she invites them to join her party. That moment, Aris learns that Neru is looking for her and quickly takes off to another location.
desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后愛麗絲为了继续进行冒险而离开。愛麗絲在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到寧瑠在找愛麗絲的消息后，愛麗絲立刻前往其他地方。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 爱丽丝在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后爱丽丝为了继续进行冒险而离开。爱丽丝在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到尼禄在找爱丽丝的消息后，爱丽丝立刻前往其他地方。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 爱丽丝在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后爱丽丝为了继续进行冒险而离开。爱丽丝在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到宁瑠在找爱丽丝的消息后，爱丽丝立刻前往其他地方。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 爱丽丝在校园移动的过程中，遇见了正在慢跑的堇。两人互相认为对方是同伴和运动伙伴，而后爱丽丝为了继续进行冒险而离开。爱丽丝在校外遇见了穿着校服的明日奈和花凛，她向两人提议下次一起去冒险，并且邀请两人加入队伍。听到妮露在找爱丽丝的消息后，爱丽丝立刻前往其他地方。

desc.en: Walking in the campus, Aris and Sensei came to the Track & Field area. Aris heard a strange noise suddenly, and thought it was a "Random Enemy Encounter" event. It turned out to be Sumire. Sumire and Aris exchanged some benefits on sports and exercises.
desc.jp: Walking in the campus, Aris and Sensei came to the Track & Field area. Aris heard a strange noise suddenly, and thought it was a "Random Enemy Encounter" event. It turned out to be Sumire. Sumire and Aris exchanged some benefits on sports and exercises.

desc.zh_tw: 愛麗絲和老师在校园走着，来到了田径跑道。愛麗絲突然听见了奇怪的声音，认为是“遇敌事件”，结果原来是堇。堇和愛麗絲交谈了几句，互相交换了关于运动的好处之类。

desc.en: 艦長琳被特意準備了一個大衣。陽葵表示這些服裝經過改造後，不僅實現了生理監測，同時還具備防火之類的功能。雖然有些人對這套服裝仍頗有微詞，不過琳很快平息衝突，進入正題。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 舰长琳被特意准备了一个大衣。日鞠表示这些服装经过改造后，不仅实现了生理监测，同时还具备防火之类的功能。虽然有些人对这套服装仍颇有微词，不过琳很快平息冲突，进入正题。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: 琳宣佈風華同學正式負責船上的餐飲供給，同時一同到來的還有美食研究會。風華對莫名其妙來到這裡有些不滿，但美食研究會解釋稱這是為了嚐到“太空美食”――雖然這番說辭對風華而言並沒有什麼吸引力。亞伽裡同時提到為了以防萬一，他們順便還把供給部的小車也給拿上來了。眾人的期望和興致都很高。
desc.jp: 琳宣佈風華同學正式負責船上的餐飲供給，同時一同到來的還有美食研究會。風華對莫名其妙來到這裡有些不滿，但美食研究會解釋稱這是為了嚐到“太空美食”――雖然這番說辭對風華而言並沒有什麼吸引力。亞伽裡同時提到為了以防萬一，他們順便還把供給部的小車也給拿上來了。眾人的期望和興致都很高。
desc.thai: 琳宣佈風華同學正式負責船上的餐飲供給，同時一同到來的還有美食研究會。風華對莫名其妙來到這裡有些不滿，但美食研究會解釋稱這是為了嚐到“太空美食”――雖然這番說辭對風華而言並沒有什麼吸引力。亞伽裡同時提到為了以防萬一，他們順便還把供給部的小車也給拿上來了。眾人的期望和興致都很高。
desc.ko: 琳宣佈風華同學正式負責船上的餐飲供給，同時一同到來的還有美食研究會。風華對莫名其妙來到這裡有些不滿，但美食研究會解釋稱這是為了嚐到“太空美食”――雖然這番說辭對風華而言並沒有什麼吸引力。亞伽裡同時提到為了以防萬一，他們順便還把供給部的小車也給拿上來了。眾人的期望和興致都很高。
desc.zh_tw: 琳宣佈風華同學正式負責船上的餐飲供給，同時一同到來的還有美食研究會。風華對莫名其妙來到這裡有些不滿，但美食研究會解釋稱這是為了嚐到“太空美食”――雖然這番說辭對風華而言並沒有什麼吸引力。亞伽裡同時提到為了以防萬一，他們順便還把供給部的小車也給拿上來了。眾人的期望和興致都很高。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 琳宣布枫香同学正式负责船上的餐饮供给，同时一同到来的还有美食研究会。枫香对莫名其妙来到这里有些不满，但美食研究会解释称这是为了尝到“太空美食”――虽然这番说辞对枫香而言并没有什么吸引力。亚伽里同时提到为了以防万一，他们顺便还把供餐部的小车也给拿上来了。众人的期望和兴致都很高。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 琳宣布风华同学正式负责船上的餐饮供给，同时一同到来的还有美食研究会。风华对莫名其妙来到这里有些不满，但美食研究会解释称这是为了尝到“太空美食”――虽然这番说辞对风华而言并没有什么吸引力。亚伽里同时提到为了以防万一，他们顺便还把供给部的小车也给拿上来了。众人的期望和兴致都很高。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 琳宣布风香同学正式负责船上的餐饮供给，同时一同到来的还有美食研究会。风香对莫名其妙来到这里有些不满，但美食研究会解释称这是为了尝到“太空美食”――虽然这番说辞对风香而言并没有什么吸引力。明里同时提到为了以防万一，他们顺便还把供餐部的小车也给拿上来了。众人的期望和兴致都很高。

desc.en: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.

desc.zh_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直譯為 阿羅娜)是蔚藍檔案中的“什錦之箱”中的系統管理員，設定上是一個輔助老師的個人小助理。彩奈的整體色調是藍色，與遊戲名稱“蔚藍檔案”相呼應。儘管長得很可愛，彩奈在幫助老師招募學生時卻經常會不出三星，具體是故意還是不小心的就不得人知了。從某種層面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄託著出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直译为 阿罗娜)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。彩奈的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，彩奈在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。从某种层面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄托着出彩的希望（bushi）。

desc.en: 老師想起來與黑服的對話，其中黑服表示強行啟動戰艦將可能導致老師的肉體受到損害。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 老师想起来与黑服的对话，其中黑服表示强行启动战舰将可能导致老师的肉体受到损害。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.
desc.jp: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: 老師讓彩奈照做不妨。彩奈詢問這麼做的原因。

desc.en: 黑服在與老師的交流中提到，即便老師這麼去做了，命運的歸宿最終仍會讓基沃託斯到達終結，就像白子那一般。黑服無法理解老師為何在一個命運已經決定的世界裡奮力掙扎到這種地步。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑服在与老师的交流中提到，即便老师这么去做了，命运的归宿最终仍会让基沃托斯到达终结，就像白子那一般。黑服无法理解老师为何在一个命运已经决定的世界里奋力挣扎到这种地步。

desc.jp: Arona is the system manager of the Shittim Chest in Blue Archive, who is set to be a personal assistant for Sensei. She is overall blue, recalling the game title Blue Archive. Though being cute, Arona seldom brings Sensei a 3-star student when recruiting, which is unknown for being either accidentally or intentionally. In Chinese (Traditional) translation, Arona is called "彩奈", with the "彩" (rainbow) indicating the color of the letter for a 3-star student; from some aspects, it might be an intensional case for wishing more 3-star students.

desc.zh_tw: 彩奈(英文名 Arona 直譯為 阿羅娜)是蔚藍檔案中的“什錦之箱”中的系統管理員，設定上是一個輔助老師的個人小助理。彩奈的整體色調是藍色，與遊戲名稱“蔚藍檔案”相呼應。儘管長得很可愛，彩奈在幫助老師招募學生時卻經常會不出三星，具體是故意還是不小心的就不得人知了。從某種層面上看，繁中有意在其名字中加入“彩”一字，大概也是寄託著出彩的希望（bushi）。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 阿罗娜(Arona)是蔚蓝档案中的“什锦之箱”中的系统管理员，设定上是一个辅助老师的个人小助理。阿罗娜的整体色调是蓝色，与游戏名称“蔚蓝/碧蓝档案”相呼应。尽管长得很可爱，阿罗娜在帮助老师招募学生时却经常会不出三星，具体是故意还是不小心的就不得人知了。国际服繁中将其称呼为“彩奈”，某种层面上看可能是在希望阿罗娜能够多出点彩（bushi）。

desc.en: The Black Suit is a villain in Blue Archive, a member of Gematria. His main goal is to investigate the "Mythic" in Kivotos, as well as exploit the power of the AI so-called Decagrammaton. He appears in multiple stories.

desc.zh_tw: 黑色西服人是蔚藍檔案中的反派角色，隸屬於組織“數祕會”。其主要目標是研究基沃託斯中的神祕，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多個故事中均有出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 黑色西服人是蔚蓝档案中的反派角色，隶属于组织“数秘会”。其主要目标是研究基沃托斯中的神秘，以及利用“十字神明”AI的力量。在多个故事中均有出现。

desc.en: 老師內心做著激烈的鬥爭，琳把老師拉回現實。老師詢問琳當時是如何回答會長關於“第二項古則”的問題的――更準確的來說，琳是如何填空的。

desc.en: 會長相信，琳與她之間無法互相理解、無法觸及彼此而只能走在各自的道路上，是一種天意。會長很喜歡琳完成的句子：透過無法理解的他人（事物），是否能夠理解自己（彼此）呢？

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。

desc.zh_tw: 詩音是一位隸屬於克洛盧斯新聞部的部員，負責基沃託斯多數新聞事件的報導工作。其有時與麻衣一起出場，在劇情中主要負責新聞實況的解說員，一些新聞大螢幕上常常能看見她充滿激情地播報著動態。

desc.en: 詩音向電視機前的觀眾介紹DU白鳥區的修復程序，提到了在本次事件中各地區的傷亡人數都很低，可謂奇蹟。她隨後提及了關於聖所之塔的情況，指出大樓雖然被破壞，但實際上在會長消失後就並未使用。詩音還提及了關於夏萊的一個傳聞：老師最後在田野裡奔跑著、向學生招手。直播被立刻中斷。

desc.zh_cn_jp: 诗音向电视机前的观众介绍DU白鸟区的修复进程，提到了在本次事件中各地区的伤亡人数都很低，可谓奇迹。她随后提及了关于圣所之塔的情况，指出大楼虽然被破坏，但实际上在会长消失后就并未使用。诗音还提及了关于夏莱的一个传闻：老师最后在田野里奔跑着、向学生招手。直播被立刻中断。

desc.en: 麻衣代替詩音進行播報。麻衣提到聯邦學生會將重建聖所之塔，具體的承建人似乎包含了凱撒建築，其中可能有一些不透明的東西。螢幕最終被關掉。

desc.en: 畫面轉到PMC的辦公室，聯邦學生會防衛室的部長香耶正在與PMC的將軍交談。兩人重申了一些共識，指出他們的合作仍然有效，希望之後能提供支援。

desc.en: 遊戲開發部四人回到了自己的社團活動室，發現愛麗絲正在做一個小機器人的模型。愛麗絲說這是Kei在消失前，她所看見的東西――也就象徵著Kei本身。

desc.en: 遊戲開發部眾人來到了特異現象搜查部的活動室，在那他們意外見到了季。季表示會長仍然處於失蹤狀態，因而現在正在求職。愛麗絲邀請季加入自己的隊伍，但被季謝絕，表示自己有任務在身。

desc.en: 陽葵前來詢問發生了什麼。眾人說在桃井的遊戲機上突然出現了一個以Kei的名字所命名的存檔。陽葵對這種情況先是一驚，但之後表示這一檔案的大小和結構都很奇怪，可能需要莉音的幫助才能解析。

desc.en: 愛麗絲掏出了自己做的小機器人，跟陽葵說這是她照著Kei的樣子做出來的。她希望能將Kei給帶回來。雖然暫時無法解析檔案資料，但陽葵提議為模型增加儲存功能，將檔案存進去，順便當個鑰匙扣。愛麗絲欣然同意。

desc.en: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.jp: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.thai: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.ko: Sensei wakes from a bizarre dream and learns from Nanagami Rin that the General Student Council president is missing. The Academy City, Kivotos, is in chaos. Sensei heads to Schale to try to resolve the situation.
desc.zh_tw: 從莫名其妙的夢中醒來之後，老師從聯邦學生會的幹部七神琳那裡聽到聯邦學生會長消失的訊息。由於聯邦學生會長失蹤，學園城市奇普託斯陷入混亂。為了解決這場混亂，老師和學生會的幹部一同前往夏萊社團室。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往夏莱社团室。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往夏莱社团室。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 从莫名其妙的梦中醒来之后，老师从联邦学生会的干部七神琳那里听到联邦学生会长消失的消息。由于联邦学生会长失踪，学园城市奇普托斯陷入混乱。为了解决这场混乱，老师和学生会的干部一同前往沙勒社团室。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.ko: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_tw: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.zh_cn_jp: 琳是联邦学生会的副会长，在新手教程以及终章中出现过。

desc.en: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.
desc.jp: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.
desc.thai: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.
desc.ko: In the reception room, Yuuka from Millennium, Hasumi and Suzumi from Trinity, as well as Chinatsu from Gehenna, were all demanding an excuse for all the chaos after the disappearance of the General Student Council's President. Rin confirmed the news of disappearance, and Sensei greeted everyone. Rin introduced Sensei to everyone, and asked them to escort Sensei to Schale. On the way, they were attacked and the three started to engage, with Sensei commanding in the back.
desc.zh_tw: 在招待室裡，來自千年的優香，三一的蓮實和鈴美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在為學生會會長消失後的各種混亂情況要個說法。琳在眾人面前坦白了學生會會長下落不明的新聞，而老師則向所有人打招呼。琳向眾人介紹了老師，並要眾人保衛老師到達夏萊；路上，眾人受到攻擊，三人開始作戰，老師則在後方指揮。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 在招待室里，来自千禧年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及歌赫娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达夏莱；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 在招待室里，来自千年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达夏莱；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 在招待室里，来自千年的优香，三一的莲实和铃美，以及格黑娜的千夏，正在为学生会会长消失后的各种混乱情况要个说法。琳在众人面前坦白了学生会会长下落不明的新闻，而老师则向所有人打招呼。琳向众人介绍了老师，并要众人保卫老师到达沙勒；路上，众人受到攻击，三人开始作战，老师则在后方指挥。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en: Momoka is the chief of the General Student Council's Transportation Office. She appears in the Tutorial and some other stories. She has a lazy personality, prefers to avoiding things, and likes eating the chips all the time. Under the current situation, her main task is to distribute tasks to Sensei.

desc.zh_tw: 桃香是基沃託斯學生會交通部的部長，在新手教程以及其他一些劇情中均有出現。個人性格很懶，喜歡逃避事情，還喜歡天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在當前設定下，桃香的主要任務就是把任務分配給老師做。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 桃香是基沃托斯学生会交通部的部长，在新手教程以及其他一些剧情中均有出现。个人性格很懒，喜欢逃避事情，还喜欢天天吃她的明太子味薯片。在当前设定下，桃香的主要任务就是把任务分配给老师做。

desc.en:
The 17th track in Blue Archive OST, usually plays in the "Store" page. It's also widely known as the song for the recollection lobby of Yuuka's.
Its title can be translated into "Welcome" in English, the greetings when you enter a store or restaurant.

desc.zh_cn:
蔚蓝档案OST的第十七首曲子，常在“商店”页播放，也是优香回忆大厅的主题曲。
曲子的标题在日语中意为“欢迎”，即当你走进一家商店或餐厅时所会听到的问候语。

desc.en: Mai is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Shinon in some stories.
desc.jp: Mai is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Shinon in some stories.
desc.thai: Mai is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Shinon in some stories.
desc.ko: Mai is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Shinon in some stories.
desc.zh_tw: 麻衣是一位隸屬於克洛盧斯新聞部的部員，負責基沃託斯多數新聞事件的報導工作，在部分劇情中與詩音一起出現。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 麻衣是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作，在部分剧情中与诗音一起出现。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 麻衣是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作，在部分剧情中与诗音一起出现。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 麻衣是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作，在部分剧情中与诗音一起出现。

desc.en: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.jp: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.thai: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.ko: Shinon is a member of Kronos School's News Club, who is responsible for reporting most news events in Kivotos. She appears with Mai sometimes, and plays a role of live news commentator. She can be seen reporting news energetically on some big news screens.
desc.zh_tw: 詩音是一位隸屬於克洛盧斯新聞部的部員，負責基沃託斯多數新聞事件的報導工作。其有時與麻衣一起出場，在劇情中主要負責新聞實況的解說員，一些新聞大螢幕上常常能看見她充滿激情地播報著動態。
desc.zh_cn_jp: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。
desc.zh_cn_tw: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。
desc.zh_cn_cn: 诗音是一位隶属于克洛卢斯新闻部的部员，负责基沃托斯多数新闻事件的报导工作。其有时与麻衣一起出场，在剧情中主要负责新闻实况的解说员，一些新闻大屏幕上常常能看见她充满激情地播报着动态。
